name: Capitals Quiz Game
desc: Designed a quiz game about capital cities of 20 most known countries. The game also has a timer. Players can quit anytime and at the end, players will be noticed about their points.

name: MovieGram
desc: Designed an application about movies. Express-session based creating user and logging in. Creating, updating and deleting your own movies. Adding comments for other users' movies. Used MongoDB for databases.

name: Order-Eatz (Group Project)
desc: Designed an online-ordering application as a group project. Collaborated with three other colleagues.Users can login and signup. Users also can create, edit or delete orders and make a fake payment. Improved team-work, communication, git-branch skills.

name: LiquidLounge
desc: Designed an application about cocktails with the idea of working as a bartender. Users can login and sign up. With the classic drink section, there are 50 most popular cocktails and users can add them on their favorites and also remove them. Users can create, edit and delete their own drinks and can add reviews for other users' drinks as well.
